title: What's the point of Dr. Mundo again?
body:
Literally all I see this champion do is spam Q and R whenever possible, use E and W for farming or for trading, and then use his Q as the only bit of help for teamfights as the rest of what he does just isn't that great in teamfights.

No, but seriously, what's the point of him as a champion again? Because when I play him I feel like I'm useless, I mean, am I playing him wrong? Is there a strategy? I'd really like to know.
